reviewerName: benjamin saitz "it's all on my blog.."
reviewtext: I'm on my 4th digital camera, and this is it, and boy is it amazing.  You can print out 8x10 (using ofot.com or shutterfly) and not be able to tell it wasn't a film camera!  The microdrive gives you more capacity than  you'll ever need.  Great LCD screen and great USB transfers.
